text: Nekrasovka () is a rural locality (a village) in Imendyashevsky Selsoviet, Gafuriysky District, Bashkortostan, Russia. The population was 52 as of 2010. There is 1 street. == Geography == It is located 46 km from Krasnousolsky, 3 km from Karagayevo. == References == Category:Rural localities in Gafuriysky District
title: Nekrasovka, Gafuriysky District, Republic of Bashkortostan
